name: What A Messeor
description:
Hi, this is my first project with Unity and my first entry in a Game Jam. 

Theme: What A Mess

The theme is "What A Mess" so I brainstormed a game where everything is a mess. The source code, the  physics and the gameplay as well. So I came up with this asteroids clone where you can not win because the meteors will become messeors. Have fun and try to beat your own highscore.

Movement: WASD
Fire: Mouse + Left Mouse Button
Shield: Right Mouse Button (Indicator if shield is ready is on the mothership)

Graphics: The graphics are selfdrawn.
Explosions: The explosions are created with explosion generator Crumb-fx v1.2 (http://explosiongenerator.com/).
Sounds: The sounds were created with bfxr (bfxr.net) and Bosca Ceoil (boscaceoil.net).
Engine: Unity 2019.2.9f1 (unity.com)

Updates before Game Jam deadline

  • bullets are now brighter 
  • left mouse button can be hold
  • there is now a shield to survive hard situations
  • new background music
